channel.title: partner on kavalan
channel.description: Recent content in partner on kavalan

item.title: wedding2022
item.description: wedding2022 I was tired of going to my mother’s house. We, my wife and I, are planning to take photos for the memory of our marriage. And the photo will be taken near my mother’s house. If you take such a photo in Kyoto, your memory would become a one of tourists. So, I avoid taking photos for wedding in Kyoto but take them in Okayama, which is the city my mother lives in.
